scripts.install:all: npm install && npm install --prefix backend && npm install --prefix frontend
scripts.dev: concurrently -n backend,frontend -c blue,green "npm run dev --prefix backend" "npm run dev --prefix frontend"
scripts.build: npm run build --prefix backend && npm run build --prefix frontend
scripts.start: concurrently -n backend,frontend -c blue,green "npm run start --prefix backend" "npm run start --prefix frontend"
scripts.lint: npm run lint --prefix backend && npm run lint --prefix frontend
scripts.test: npm run test --prefix backend && npm run test --prefix frontend
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules && rm -rf backend/node_modules && rm -rf frontend/node_modules
